reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We drove here from the Shannon airport. The hotel was comfortable and clean.Kate at the front desk was helpful with directions. The hotel was close to groceries, pubs and coffee shops. It was an easy drive to make a loop to Cliffs of Moher, Doolin, Black head and back.
reviews.title: Good hotel for first night in Ireland
Great Hotel
reviews.text: My wife , sister in law and her husband stayed in the Temple Gate on Sat 30th Feb, the welcome we received was very friendly, check in was fast, the room was large and very clean , the decor was bright and warm, we had. A light meal in the bar, service was fast , food hot, the music in the. Bar was great , very lively and not to loud, the staff were very helpful and friendly, Claire at the front desk was very helpful, the hotel was so central to Ennis town , a few minutes walk from hotel,
overall we had a great stay, would highly recommend the Temple Gate Hotel, will stay there again.
reviews.title: Great stay!

reviews.text: We were in the hotel as part of a Globus tour also and found the hotel clean, charming, and very comfortable. Not sure when others were at Temple Gate, but we did not experience any of the things others did at this hotel. The porters were incredibly quick with a huge amount of luggage on our trip. Our room was clean and well-appointed. The staff, with the exception of one front desk clerk, were all happy and quite helpful. Any question we had was answered kindly.
reviews.title: Where's the Temple and where's the Gate!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The service in the pub and restaurant mirrored the service we had elsewhere in Ireland. Coming from the US we are accustomed to quicker service, but overall, there was nothing to complain about. The food in Preacher's Pub was outstanding!
reviews.title: Disappointed. More expensive than most similar hotels.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in the Temple Gate Hotel for a night recently. We'd stayed there before on one previous occasion and had had a very negative experience, however our stay this time was much improved. The renovation process seems to have stretched to all rooms in the hotel, including those on the top floor. We stayed in room 301 just beside the lift and found it to be spacious with a very comfortable bed and decent shower. I'm not a fan of those cloth shower curtains as I don't feel they're very higyenic, but apart from that the bathroom was very nice. We didn't have breakfast in the hotel the next day so I can't comment on that. This hotel is in a great location in Ennis town and I have to say that all the staff were very polite and helpful.
reviews.title: Nicely renovated

reviews.text: Stayed here with family and friends for three days this week. From the moment of check-in we were treated with the utmost efficiency.Ambience throughout is warm, and the general manager is a thorough professional. Looking forward to my next visit already.
reviews.title: Courteous staff and efficient management

reviews.text: My family have just spent a wonderful few days in Ireland, our first stop was in Ennis, we stayed at The temple Gate Hotel, what a lovely hotel! We thouroughly recommend staying here. The rooms are lovely and clean, the hotel staff are very friendly. The Poachers bar is a real treat if you want a bar snack and a drink. We didn't dine in the restaurant, but we had breakfast both mornings and again this was lovely. We will definately stay again!!
reviews.title: wonderful Hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: the temple gate hotel was *a dream* of a boutique hotel! the room was spic and span, spacious and welcoming, the bathroom nice and roomy.... the hotel is historically themed, the staff welcoming and efficient. we loved the pub, we loved the town of ennis -- it was a perfect first night's stay in ireland -- almost a honeymoon!
reviews.title: i would go back here in a minute!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed for one night. The girls on the reception desk were very good and helpful. Preachers bar was good for a Guinness or 2. It is right in the middle of town so walking was not a problem, also a free car park. No WIFI in the room but worked OK in the lobby.
reviews.title: It was good.

reviews.text: Recently spent an overnight here. Clean, comfortable, but a bit on the small side for 2 people. Great location, right off the main drag, so it was quiet. Nice breakfast. Really was only there a short time but would recommend it.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel

reviews.text: Hotel was very stylish and attractive. Fantastic location, just off the towns main street. Rooms were very cosy- clean and warm, beds very comfortable. No complaints at all.
reviews.title: Perfect!

reviews.text: I had the opportunity in June12 to stay at the Temple Gate Hotel (TGH) in downtown Ennis, Co. Clare, Ireland several times for a total of about 5 nights. It's a great location, 20 minutes from Shannon Airport, Ennis downtown is nice with some good pubs, not far from the beaches at Lahinch and the Cliffs of Moher. And, only a hour to Galway.
reviews.title: Great location but some small problems

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The TGH has a nice little pub, the Preacher's Pub, with nightly sessions.
reviews.title: Pleasant surprise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: BUT, they have some problems with their plumbing and their internet.
reviews.title: TAKE YOUR CONFIRMATION WITH YOU

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Lovely little hotel in the middle of Ennis. Great for exploring the area. Free parking out the front. A little bit pricy considering there was no breakfast included. You also have to pay for Wifi which always annoys me.
reviews.title: Great hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed two nights as part of a bus tour.
reviews.title: Nice funky old place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: PLUSES
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel

reviews.text: Nice, older facility
reviews.title: August Getway

reviews.text: Reservations - keys for bus tour all ready and handed out quickly
reviews.title: Excellent hotel in a lovely little town
